alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 11 at 1:58PM MDT until April 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM CDT /3 PM MDT/ TUESDAY TO 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions and heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 10 inches expected and ice accumulations of a light glaze are possible. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Corson and Campbell Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM CDT /3 PM MDT/ Tuesday to 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds will likely cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
